attributes.action: Say no to the proprosed Ecotown for Kellington, Beal and Eggborough and find a more suitable brownfield site
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With reference the proposed site of the 15,000 home “Eco Town” between the villages of Eggbrough and Kellington in North Yorkshire.

Please sign this petition if you are opposed to this proposal.
